price: (Abͻneεfoͻ yi de no saa ara) kͻpem sε, owuo bεba wͻn mu bi soͻ, (εhͻ na) ͻbεka sε: “Me Wura Nyankopͻn, ma mensan nkͻ (wiase bio),
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadahumu al-mawtu qāla rabbi ir'jiʿūni
